title: Beetles
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and ERPI Classroom Films
brief_description: Life histories of the tiger, ladybird and Japanese beetles. Many rarely observed events in their lives are presented: some comic, some tragic. The economic relations of beetles to man is brought out. Some beetles have been pressed into the service of man, while others are harmful and must be destroyed.
